Malnvenshorn App Repository

This is a repository of apps from Sven Lohrmann

Currently it serves 2 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://malnvenshorn.github.io/fdroid-repository/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
1C 36 CF 8B 9C 2C 9C 7F 59 1D 67 78 0D 08 BA 55 4E A4 9E C1 8F 7D 93 66 8C CD 48 F7 33 74 00 04
